resources.string: Ben\"Desno365\'in Mods\" uygulamasını bazı mütiş Minecraft Pocket Edition Modları indirmek için kullanıyorum!Şuna bakin http://bit.ly/DesnoMods
If you have any suggestions, questions or ideas about this app send me an email!
Desno365\'in modları uygulamasına hoşgeldiniz.\nBurada tüm modlarımın son sürümlerini ve değişikliklerini kontrol edebilirsiniz.
Bağlantı hatası: Lütfen internet bağlantınızı kontrol edin.
Tabancalar. Silahlar. Patlayıcılar. İşte bu DesnoGuns Mod! :D

Portal hakkı tanıyor musun? Ünlü first-person bulmaca platform video oyun Valve tarafından geliştirilen.\nBu mod Minecraft Pocket Edition Portal 2 bazı özellikleri getiriyor!\nBeş farklı Portal Guns , Hava İnanç Tabak, Sevk ve Repulsion jeller , Turrets . Bunlar, bu mod içinde bulabilirsiniz şeylerden bazılarıdır.
The Laser Guns Addon for the DesnoGuns Mod adds awesome new futuristic guns in Minecraft PE.

• There are twelve different discs with twelve different songs (songs are ported from Minecraft PC).
• Tap the jukebox with a disc and it will start playing the chosen song.
• Greater the distance between you and the Jukebox, lower the volume of it.
• Support multiple jukeboxes that play simultaneously.
• There is a random chance of finding a disc every 30 kills of hostile mobs.
• Tap the Jukebox to eject the disc. When the song ends the disc will be ejected automatically.
• The Jukebox block and the discs are also in the creative inventory.
• The crafting recipes of the Jukebox are the same of the PC version.

This map and the mod attached bring the Non-Euclidean geometry on your mobile device!
Experience the craziness of an unreal world, in a normal/Euclidean game like Minecraft.
Words can\’t explain in a good way what this map has.
Try it, you'll see.

Bu uygulamayı geliştirmek için fikrin mi var?
Twitter'dan benimle iletişime kurun!

Eğer beni desteklemek isterseniz lütfen Google Play Store'da bu uygulamaya 5 yildiz verin. Bu benim yeni harika modlar yapmama yardımcı olacak! Teşekkürler:)
Click on the tabs or swipe on your screen to switch page in the help section.
Bu sayfadaki herhangi bir resim üstüne basarak onu tam ekran yapabilirsiniz.

This section of the app will help you to install any \"modpkg\" mod in Minecraft Pocked Edition. The \"modpkg\" format allows to have all the resources of the mod in a single file, so it\'s easier to install. By swiping to the right you\'ll guided in all the steps.
You need two apps: Minecraft Pocket Edition and BlockLauncher (the free version or the pro version).
First you have to download the mod you want to use. To download the mod you can press the \"Download this mod from Desno\'s website\" button.
You\'ll be brought to Desno\'s website where, under the \"Downloads\" section, you can get the modpkg file.
Now that you have downloaded the mod open BlockLauncher, click the \"Settings\" icon and go to \"Manage ModPE Scripts\".
Make sure the switch in the upper right is ON and click the \"+\" button.
Import the mod from local storage (the mod is the .modpkg file you have downloaded before).
Receive notifications for new mods updates
The app needs to be restarted for the language change to be activated.\n\nWARNING: Custom languages may not be accurate.
Collaborate to this project and help translating the app
The app needs to be restarted for the theme change to be activated.
Restore tips and suggestions in the Help page
Allow anonymous tracking of errors and general usage
